resources.string:
Freshmen are usually shy … The purpose of the first task is to put the freshman in the right frame of mind to face the challenges ahead!
Freshman, for goodness sake, head out to the courtyard in front of the bar of Building A!

Task: The freshman has to walk, for 5 minutes in a row, around the courtyard of the Building A, blinking an eye and smiling with the front camera of the mobile device pointed at you

Campus 2 has several buildings, each one identified by a letter (A, B, C, D and E). Some have been studying for several years at IPL and have difficulty remembering the letter that identifies a particular building.
Freshman, for goodness sake, go to the roundabout at the entrance to Building A!

Task: The freshman has to take a picture of something that identifies each of the four buildings. Clue: "Edifício X"

The José Saramago Library is perhaps the most emblematic of Campus 2 buildings. Any self-respecting e-Godfather should motivate his freshman to acclimatize to this temple of knowledge.
Freshman, for goodness sake, go to the Library!

Task: The José Saramago Library is an area of ​​Culture, Knowledge and …?

Being "praxado" is a lot of fun, but in the end you have to go back to the real world … 
 The freshman should carry out an outdoor meditation session that allows him to relax so that you can go back to class calm and focused.
Freshman, for goodness sake, head out to the courtyard in front of the bar of Building A!

Task: The freshman must be seated for 10 minutes, in the courtyard of the Building A, with the phone on your lap with the screen facing down (it s for relaxing!). If it is raining the freshman can fulfill this task in one of the 3 points of interest near the place where it is.
User password can not be empty
User email can not be empty
Error trying to save user data
Do you really want to sign out of your account?
Please enter your registered email ID
The freshman has 1 minute to move to the courtyard of A. Start in ESSlei.
Good Freshman! You managed to complete everything in 1 hour, just shy out timing out!
Good Freshman! You have completed everything in
Unfortunately the time is up! You just completed
Freshman, head for the courtyard of A
Freshman, go to the roundabout near the A
Freshman, do you want to return to the game menu?
Freshman, are you sure you want to finish the game? Any progress you\'ve made will be lost
Good freshman! You managed to improve your time, congratulations! Check the information icon to see your stats
The freshman has to walk, for 5 minutes in a row, around the yard Building A, blinking an eye and smiling with the front camera of the mobile device pointed at you!
The José Saramago Library is an area of ​​Culture, Knowledge and …? To complete this task, you should take a photo of the answer somewhere in the Library
The freshman must be seated for 10 minutes in the courtyard of the Building A, with the phone on your lap with the screen facing down (it\'s for relaxing!).
It has been detected that the best conditions are not met to finish this activity in the yard.
Please go to one of these places of interest if you wish.
Watch out, it\'s about to end!
You have to follow the rules!
Welcome to the courtyard of A!
Come on Freshman! Blink those eyes
Freshman you must be over 17 years old
You have to be at the courtyard of A!
The freshman has to take a picture of something that identifies each of the four buildings. Clue: \"Edifício X\"
